sub_title: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics
summary:
I bring a global perspective to local actions with my AI expertise, data-driven approach, and passion for impact. I believe in the power of teamwork and continuous learning, and have experience in both marketing and finance. 
When developing the AI strategy I keep in mind ways of its implementation. Having dirty hands while doing data science projects I clearly see the final goal: the business impact. Executing an analytical project, I see how insights can bring ROI. This is why I make an impact on global companies, managing global breakthrough projects. 
Join me in making a difference through data-driven insights.

treasury_media.title: Data Driven Marketing
treasury_media.description: Overview of Data Driven Marketing. What is DDM? How to implement it?

treasury_media.title: Watson Analytics for HSE
treasury_media.description: The presentation on how build predictive models - the simplified approach for CxO/ LOB, with example on the basis of IBM Watson Analytics (free version).

projects.title: Optimization of price, portfolio and market in B2B
projects.description: Simulation of sales process events allows generating possible outcomes of future offerings. As a seller, you can manage several parameters of offering: price realization, configuration of the product, set of the products for client, and market segment to make a stress on. These parameters influence to outcome of sales proposals alltogether with a complex interlinked power. Monte-Carlo method allows not only generate offers, but also search for optimal offers in multidemsional space of the parameters for each product line, each market - to maximize gross margin of the business unit.

contributors.headline: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics

projects.title: Recommendation function for IBM sellers
projects.description: Using standard SVD approach, based on consolidated European company table and sales data for 2011-2015 I built a recommendation function for sellers. For each company, it recommends to seller what is the next best category to start negotiation about with the client. The approach has been validated using 2011-2013 data and 2014 as a control.

contributors.headline: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics

projects.title: UNICA implementation in R/CIS and CEE countries
projects.description: A specific model was chosen when technical specialists served CEE from India.

contributors.headline: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics
Product @Adobe - Customer Success |GTM Analytics | ML Data Platform | SaaS Transformation | MDM | MarTech | Data Strategy & Governance |Data Engineering|

projects.title: Worldwide mobile audio guide
projects.description: This is cloud-based mobile audio guide to any point on the Earth, for any traveller. It speaks in 16 languages, and contains 51 million audio tracks - both derived from open-source databases (incl. open city projects) and privatly-held by partners. Some of the audio tracks depend on time - like the bus schedule for each stop in London - and are generated at the moment when traveller comes, in his own language. Any user can also share his audio experience along with photo-experience so this will be available to all the rest at this point of the World.

contributors.headline: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics

projects.title: Segment analysis for InBev (Klinskoe)
projects.description: Search for free segment at Russian beer market. Deep understanding of customer behavior, development of positioning policy for chosen segment. Klinskoe beer brand, re-launch after plant purchase by Sun-Interbrew. As a result "Who will go for Klinskoe" campaign was developed and successfully ran.

contributors.headline: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics

projects.title: Maximization of gross margin through portfolio optimization in B2C
projects.description: Piermattia was at the internship in Philips for half of a year, and we did together a nice project dedicated to understanding how products offered on the market are interrelated in terms of demand depending on their features. This includes the whole scope of products offered in a country, with multidimensional space of all attributes. Based on actual choices of consumers, it was possible to understand where potential customers could flow in case of the changes in the portfolio.

contributors.headline: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics

projects.title: CoNQ Warranty forecast in B2C
projects.description: Millions of consumer goods are sold by Philips around the globe and obviously thousands of warranty reclamations are received through workshops. Philips does the provision for its 2-year warranty period. How to forecast required cash-out payments? How to take into account variations at markets, retailers, sales plans, and quality improvements done at the factories? This and other problems were resolved to increase quality of forecast. It now deviates less than 3% from actuals.

contributors.headline: Business Data Scientist / Head of AI / Strategy / Analytics

projects.title: Cost Forecasts
projects.description: Each manager in the corporation is required to provide short-term (12M) forecast on costs for her department. Usually, this task requires a cyclical reconciliation with other departments and sub-divisions. The time series forecasting provides a baseline for all groups in the company to verify expectations. The approach uses both hierarchical time series ARIMA forecasts and TensorFlow approach for a quarter prediction.

profile_positions.description:
Senior Data Scientist in the Finance department (FP&A, to be sharp). It probably sounds strange, however, this position in the HQ of the global healthcare technology company provides a lot of opportunities for improvements within the enterprise. Our team did nice data projects, and there are still endless opportunities to transform Philips into AI-driven corporation.
Projects I managed include travel cost optimization, outlier detection in finance data, warranty cash-out forecast, restructuring ROI, margin simulation for B2B sales, pricing in B2C, analysis of client network ROI, product lifecycles, portfolio optimization in B2C, NMC and A&P forecast. 
The development of AI strategy and data science training for colleagues give additional fun to the job.
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
While searching for a new breakthrough position in a global organisation, I invented and designed this new service for job seekers - http://improve-my-resume.social . Those who want to get peer's advice on resume quality do this for free (I pay for hosting and domain, I programmed database and back-end engine).
Keywords: P2P, digital marketing, e-commerce.
My other project is recommendation function (collaborative filtering based on SVD) for sales department of SMB companies. Demo (in Russian) can be seen here: http://smartanalytics.biz/demo
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
I re-organized IBM worldwide client B2B database (25M+ entries of commercial and public sector entities, 120 countries) by structuring them into hierarchical global group dependencies. The job was done using facilities of 3 data centres worldwide which I managed remotely. The uniqueness of the project is in the fact that we worked on live CRM data and matched it to a number of external lists (worldwide ranking).
This database provides now the helicopter view on the worldwide business landscape to IBM’s top management and facilitates marketers/ sellers access to particular decision makers in each client business unit. The benefit for the company is both in a multi-million reduction in marketing and sales budgets because of precise targeting, and a multi-million increase of revenue because of wider access to businesses all over the world. 
Function within IBM Marketing Data Analytics & Data Strategy Organisation.
profile_positions.title: Client Information Strategy Leader

profile_positions.description:
I selected (together with European Procurement Department), trained (together with American office) and managed (together with Global Marketing Center in Romania) telemarketing vendors in 7 CEE countries. These agencies are used for all inbound and outbound telemarketing campaigns as preferred companies with access to internal IBM marketing infrastructure. I implemented Unica incorporating it into business processes of each vendor.
Keywords: multichannel, omnichannel, lead generation.
profile_positions.title: Telemarketing vendor relations leader in CEE

profile_positions.description:
I was a part of CEE Demand Generation team (Integrated Marketing Communications) in Marketing Department. I also played a key role in CEE Marketing Leadership Team. 

I was appointed as the Subject Matter Expert on internal IBM databases, and therefore my role also included consulting for internal clients and vendors. 
•	I was recognised as Expert in Marketing by worldwide management
•	IBM Analytics Ambassador
•	IBM Watson Ambassador
•	Expert in digital marketing; in direct marketing. 

In this role, I directly managed from 0 to 5 employees and was business manager for 10-30 people.
Keywords: B2B, e-commerce, strategy, planning.
profile_positions.title: Database Marketing Strategist and team leader

profile_positions.description: I did sample design for all marketing campaigns, prepared advance samples for strategic planning purposes. This required from me both deep understanding of purposes of each marketing campaign and even each marketing touch, and also expert knowledge of IBM database architecture and SQL language skills.
profile_positions.title: Database management and Direct marketing management

profile_positions.description: I developed and implemented various procedures facilitating quarterly response flow planning in each of 8 involved CEE countries; response flow control and reporting of lead development representatives (LDRs) to marketing. I implemented marketing automation tools - Unica and Cognos, trained IBMers. I was the focal point for Siebel and Unica in Russia; certified trainer of Unica for vendors.
profile_positions.title: Response-Lead Management manager

profile_positions.description: Market research, Competitive Intelligence, regional analysis, industrial research.
profile_positions.title: Market Intelligence

profile_positions.description: Global project provided to all smartphone users access to noosphere. It was implemented in the form of travel audio guide with 50M+ audio tracks (virtual, proprietary, partners, user-generated, momentary). Audio was available in 16 languages, in each point of the Earth (where mobile data is accessible).
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description: 4 subordinates, 60 workplaces, 5 servers, office relocation management.
profile_positions.title: CIO / Country IT Manager / Business Services Manager

profile_positions.description:
I managed Analytical Department (part of Marketing Department) - up to 4 subordinates.
Management of analytics team, regular building of propensity to buy/ subscribe/ renew models, long-term and short-term sales forecasts and budgeting, planning of promo activities, customer segmentation and segmentation tracking, post-mortem analysis of promo-actions, regular product tests and surveys, competitor analysis, expanding to other countries coordination, new business implementation.
profile_positions.title: Principal Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: I was contracted as CEO for 1 year of this Internet start-up company which business was dedicated to opt-in database marketing in Internet. Started with 2 people, finally company grew to 45 and was sold to strategic investor.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
I was hired by GfK to increase the value generated out of surveys. Deeper data processing using advanced techniques (often not available to clients) can significantly increase profit of market research agency. My primary task was in implementation of advanced statistical methods for quantitative market research. What is more important, I conducted education of clients and my co-workers. I also did complex ad-hoc project analysis (data mining). 
I also participated in business development activities together with CEO. 
Simultaneously I managed Press Clipping Department (5 subordinates).
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist for East European cluster

profile_positions.description: In this local market research agency I did quantitative analysis for projects (in SPSS), in some cases I also managed research projects, and also played CIO role.
profile_positions.title: Analyst

profile_positions.description: Together with partners I established the first rep office of SPSS in Russia. I searched the first clients, managed the business, and participated in organization of trainings for clients. This company is now one of authorized IBM Business Partners in Russia.
profile_positions.title: Founder and GM of Russian branch

profile_positions.description: Research in the field of math statistics and optimization. Developer of scientific software. Tutor in the University.
profile_positions.title: Junior Scientist
